availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Woodward (Ohio County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Jane Barnett Woodward in Ohio County on October 26, 1843. Father of Cinderella Woodward, Elvira C. Woodward, Atreas L. Woodward, Lawrence Woodward, and Bashte Woodward. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Army recruiter in Owensboro in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 2, p. 70B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Warrick County, Booneville, p. 480B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 6.
KYR-0002-225-0050.
